page.title: 19A VILLAGE SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is very small. There are thirteen pupils in the school and one teacher. All the children, aged from five to eleven, are taught in the same room and all work individually or in small groups. There are four children in Primary 6 and only one in Primary 1. School begins at 9.25 am and we have a 20 minute interval at 11.00 am. When it is time for lunch at 12.30 pm we have to put our work away and set the desks for lunch. The meals are brought in a car from a school about 5km away. The meals are served out in the classroom and there are sinks at one end of the room for washing the dishes.After lunch we play outside until 1.30 pm. If it is raining we are usually allowed to stay in and play games.
